vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for a Specific Use Permit for the sale of alcoholic beverages in conjunction with a general merchandise or food store 3,500 square feet or less on property zoned CR-D-1 Community Retail District with D-1 Liquor Control Overlay, on the south line of Bruton Road, east of Lewiston Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to site plan conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Denial without prejudice
Z212-167(OA)
